description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defend the crystals! Build and upgrade towers to destroy the approaching hordes of monsters, before they can reach your wizards and shatter the magical crystals. With 20 levels and 10 different endings. Can YOU cast the ultimate spell?
description.short: Defend the crystals! Build and upgrade towers to destroy the approaching hordes of monsters, before they can reach your wizards and shatter the magical crystals. With 20 levels and 10 different endings. Can YOU cast the ultimate spell?
